experience.title: experience
experience.description:
Zett uz — Front-end Developer
(Feb 2025 – Present)
Built inventory, sales and reporting modules for a business-management platform using Vue 3 & TypeScript.

MIIT, Uzbekistan — Front-end Developer
(Dec 2024 – Apr 2025)
Enhanced government dashboard with Ant Design Vue & TypeScript, boosting UX and performance.

Uniplatforms — Front-end Developer
(May 2024 – Dec 2024)
Delivered HRM & CRM systems; coordinated with clients and provided technical support using Vue/Nuxt.

UIC Group — Front-end Developer
(Aug 2023 – Apr 2024)
Built scalable Vue.js applications implementing Vuex state management.

Itransition Group — Frontend Intern
(Mar 2023 – Apr 2023 • Remote)
Developed frontend components with Object-Oriented Programming, Node.js, and JavaScript.

Robotics Lab — Frontend Intern
(Jan 2023 – Mar 2023 • Tashkent, Uzbekistan)
Built interactive e-commerce platform with React, Redux, JSX focusing on seamless UX.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
Proficient in JavaScript (ES6+) and TypeScript, leveraging the Vue.js ecosystem (Vue Router, Vuex, Pinia, Nuxt.js).

- **Real-time & Enterprise Apps:** Built chat applications, e-commerce platforms, and HRM/CRM dashboards.

- **Tools & Workflows:** Git/GitLab, responsive design, and performance optimization.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
In addition to technical expertise, I bring a robust set of soft skills that enhance my ability to work effectively in diverse teams:

- **Team Collaboration:** An effective team player who thrives in collaborative environments, fostering innovation and open communication.

- **Problem-Solving:** A solution-focused approach to overcoming challenges, ensuring smooth project execution under tight deadlines.

- **Adaptability:** Quick to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologies in a constantly evolving landscape.

- **Communication:** Strong ability to articulate technical concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences.

- **Creativity:** Combines technical proficiency with creative thinking to deliver user-centric, impactful solutions.

These skills complement my technical abilities, empowering me to contribute meaningfully to both individual and team success.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
Frontend developer from Uzbekistan with 2+ years building scalable web applications. Passionate about Vue.js ecosystem and creating user-centric solutions that solve real business problems.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: When I'm not coding, I enjoy reading, playing PES 2013, hitting the tennis courts, running, and going on hikes. I also love experimenting with new recipes and exploring the latest tech trends to keep my skills sharp.

education.title: education
education.description:
Tashkent University of Information Technologies (TUIT)
Bachelor's degree, Computer Engineering
Sep 2021 – May 2026

Focused on software development, algorithms, and modern web technologies. Gained strong foundation in programming principles and system design.

files.university: Currently pursuing Computer Engineering at TUIT, specializing in frontend development and modern web frameworks.

sports.title: sports
sports.description: I'm passionate about tennis and enjoy hitting the courts regularly. I also love running, walking, and hiking - exploring nature trails helps me stay active and clear my mind after long coding sessions. You can follow my activities on Strava.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description: My go-to game is PES 2013 - a classic football simulation that never gets old. I enjoy the strategic gameplay and competitive matches. Gaming helps me unwind and provides a fun break from development work.
